Notes.Text:
This update for python-cryptography fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2020-36242: Using the Fernet class to symmetrically encrypt multi gigabyte
  values could result in an integer overflow and buffer overflow (bsc#1182066).
Notes.Title: Details

Vulnerabilities.Description: In the cryptography package before 3.3.2 for Python, certain sequences of update calls to symmetrically encrypt multi-GB values could result in an integer overflow and buffer overflow, as demonstrated by the Fernet class.
